short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to view BugDB pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension is for Oracle employees only! It enables Oracle employees to view bugDB descriptions for bug ID's occuring anywhere in the browser. It is a convenience tool to quickly glance at the bug's status and/or description.
